name: Walletika
description: Walletika is a decentralized crypto wallet that allows crypto users to access their wallets without the need for a private key via a decentralized login protocol instead of saving their private keys or seed phrases on their devices to avoid them being stolen. it also supports the decentralized two-factor authentication (2FA) protocol to confirm transactions. Walletika can be installed as a hot wallet on the local device and a cold wallet on a removable USB drive to keep your funds safe and away from hackers. Walletika supports multiple blockchain networks, and provides staking services for different pairs, and supports sending and receiving crypto assets securely and faster with friendly user interface and many tools to improve the user experience.
